# 奇安信：红队视角下的防御体系突破

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/qi-anxin-hongdui-shijiao-xia-de-fangyu-tixi-tupo
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/qi-anxin-hongdui-shijiao-xia-de-fangyu-tixi-tupo
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install qi-anxin-hongdui-shijiao-xia-de-fangyu-tixi-tupo
qi-anxin-hongdui-shijiao-xia-de-fangyu-tixi-tupo <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g qi-anxin-hongdui-shijiao-xia-de-fangyu-tixi-tupo
qi-anxin-hongdui-shijiao-xia-de-fangyu-tixi-tupo <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
